paper_abstract: In this paper, we introduce the notions of the degrees of countable compactness and the Lindelof property in L-fuzzy topological spaces. Most of elementary results related to countable compactness and the Lindelof property in general topology can be extended to L-fuzzy topological spaces. Moreover, many characterizations of the degrees of countable compactness and the Lindelof property are presented.
paper_title: Degrees of countable compactness and the Lindelof property of L-fuzzy sets
